name: Left-Hand Shark
text:
If this card is Special Summoned from the GY: It becomes Level 4. You can only use each of the following effects of "Left-Hand Shark" once per turn. If you control "Right-Hand Shark", while this card is in your hand or GY: You can Special Summon this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. An Xyz Monster that was Summoned using only WATER monsters, including this card on the field, as material gains this effect.
? Cannot be destroyed by card effects.
